 9: .. moduleauthor: E A Faisal <eafaisal at gmail dot com>


 10: 


 11: Yet another inotify binding. Minimum requirement is a Linux kernel 2.6.26.


 12: 


 13: This module creates a very thin layer to the inotify API. It also added 2 new


 14: function calls:


 15: 


 16: - get_event()


 17: - close()


 18: 


 19: in addition to the direct binding to inotify API.


 20: 


 21: get_event() provides a C-layer read()-ing and translating inotify events into


 22: Python dictionary. close() provides a C-layer close() function call to inotify


 23: instance file descriptor.


 24: 


 25: On top of that, this module attempts to throw Python exception on error and


 26: exposes a Python dictionary INOTIFY_MASKS to facilitate translating the event


 27: mask in the event dictionary.


 28: """


 29:

 139: descriptor fd.
